caption.p: ZnCl 2 in 12CE: (a) Cyclic voltammograms with different cathodic switching potentials of 0.3 M ZnCl 2 in 12CE at a glassy carbon working electrode ( A = 0.07 cm 2), v = 10 mV s –1, Pt gauze auxiliary electrode, Zn/Zn 2+ RE. Arrow indicates sweep start in the cathodic direction. (b) Successive cyclic voltammograms of 0.3 M ZnCl 2 in 12CE on a graphene electrode ( A ≈ 0.3 cm 2) and on a zinc disk electrode ( A = 0.95 cm 2), v = 10 mV s –1, Pt gauze auxiliary electrode, Zn/Zn 2+ RE. Arrows indicate the sweep direction.
